segments.text: I glance out the open window above the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The view outside is so peaceful and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a neat garden path with lovely bushes flanking it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s such a stark contrast to the unfolding disaster inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior makes the interior scene even more unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost ironic how tranquil it appears outside the panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink continues its quiet gush, unnoticed by the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are still engaged in their precarious cookie retrieval.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sad sight to see such potential for damage and injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems so normal from the outside looking in, yet it's not.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and stop the water or stabilize that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene is full of hidden perils.
segments.speaker: PAR
